content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities due to collisions or occupied tiles
- Ensure there is enough space and no other entities are occupying the desired position before placing a new entity. Consider increasing spacing or changing direction if placement fails.

### Errors due to insufficient inventory items
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.
